definition: to share tribulations/to help sb with worries and difficulties
part/share/ingredient/component

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning

sentences.english: I take your part when the darkness comes. And pain is all around.
sentences.chinese: 当黑暗来临，苦难遍地，我会为你分忧解劳。

sentences.english: Good politician solves the problems of the people.
sentences.chinese: 好的政客上台后与民分忧。

sentences.english: I would have shared more of the responsibility carried by my husband.
May the depth of your faith and the love of those who share your loss sustain you.
sentences.chinese: 愿你笃诚的信仰和为你分忧的朋友们的爱心支撑你。

sentences.english: On weekdays in the busy and busy, for I through.
sentences.chinese: 平日忙里又忙外，为我分忧解心烦。

sentences.english: Friendships multiply joys, and divide grieves.
sentences.chinese: 友谊能够添乐，也能够分忧。

render service to repay kindness
